title: Implement automatic lease expiration with monotonic time
description:
Implement lazy expiration during claim operations with support for both finite and indefinite leases.

## Finite Leases (ttl_secs > 0)
Use monotonic clock (`Instant`) for TTL checks to avoid wall-clock issues. Reconstruct `Instant` from UTC timestamps on index load. Filter out expired leases (`now > expires_at`) and append `auto-evict` to log.

## Indefinite Leases (ttl_secs = 0)
No time-based expiry. Mark as `stale: true` if `now - last_beat > stale_threshold_secs`. Stale leases block structural edits but aren't auto-evicted (require explicit force-evict).

See design doc sections "Automatic Expiration and Staleness" and "Monotonic Time Semantics".
